Name: Defend

Description: Deal 6(9) damage.

Description: Draw 3(4) cards. Discard 1 card.

Description: Deal 7(10) damage. If the enemy is Poisoned, deal 7(10) damage again.

Description: Add 3(4) Shivs to your hand.

Description: Gain 6 Block. Add 1(2) Shiv(s) to your hand.

Name: Dagger Throw
Description: Deal 9(12) damage. Draw 1 card. Discard 1 card.

Name: Deadly Poison
Description: Apply 5(7) Poison.

Name: Deflect
Description: Gain 4(7) Block.

Name: Dodge and Roll
Description: Gain 4(6) Block. Next turn gain 4(6) Block.

Name: Flying Knee
Description: Deal 8(11) damage. Next turn gain 1 Energy.

Name: Outmaneuver
Description: Next turn, gain 2(3) Energy.

Name: Piercing Wail
Description: ALL enemies lose 6(8) Strength for 1 turn. Exhaust.

Name: Poisoned Stab
Description: Deal 6(8) damage. Apply 3(4) Poison.

Name: Prepared
Description: Draw 1(2) card(s). Discard 1(2) card(s).

Name: Quick Slash
Description: Deal 8(12) damage. Draw 1 card.

Name: Slice
Description: Deal 6(9) damage.

Name: Sneaky Strike
Description: Deal 12(16) damage. If you have discarded a card this turn, gain 2 Energy.

Name: Sucker Punch
Description: Deal 7(9) damage. Apply 1(2) Weak.

Name: Accuracy
Description: Shivs deal 4(6) additional damage.

Name: All-Out Attack
Description: Deal 10(14) damage to ALL enemies. Discard 1 card at random.

Name: Backstab
Description: Deal 11(15) damage. Innate. Exhaust.

Name: Blur
Description: Gain 5(8) Block. Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

Name: Bouncing Flask
Description: Apply 3 poison to a random enemy 3(4) times.

Name: Calculated Gamble
Description: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards. Exhaust. (Don't exhaust)

Name: Caltrops
Description: Whenever you are attacked, deal 3(5) damage back.

Name: Catalyst
Description: Double(Triple) an enemy's Poison. Exhaust.

Name: Choke
Description: Deal 12 damage. Whenever you play a card this turn, the targeted enemy loses 3(5) HP.

Name: Concentrate
Description: Discard 3(2) cards. Gain 2 Energy.

Name: Crippling Cloud
Description: Apply 4(7) Poison and 2 Weak to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

Name: Dash
Description: Gain 10(13) Block. Deal 10(13) damage.

Name: Distraction
Description: Add a random Skill to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

Name: Endless Agony
Description: Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it to your hand. Deal 4(6) damage. Exhaust.

Name: Escape Plan
Description: Draw 1 card. If you draw a Skill, gain 3(5) Block.

Name: Eviscerate
Description: Costs 1 less Energy for each card discarded this turn. Deal 7(9) damage three times.

Name: Expertise
Description: Draw cards until you have 6(7) in your hand.

Name: Finisher
Description: Deal 6(8) damage for each Attack played this turn.

Name: Flechettes
Description: Deal 4(6) damage for each Skill in your hand.

Name: Footwork
Description: Gain 2(3) Dexterity.

Name: Heel Hook
Description: Deal 5(8) damage. If the enemy is Weak, Gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card.

Name: Infinite Blades
Description: (Innate.) At the start of your turn, add a Shiv to your hand.

Name: Leg Sweep
Description: Apply 2(3) Weak. Gain 11(14) Block.

Name: Masterful Stab
Description: Costs 1 additional Energy for each time you lose HP this combat. Deal 12(16) damage.

Name: Noxious Fumes
Description: At the start of your turn, apply 2(3) Poison to ALL enemies.

Name: Predator
Description: Deal 15(20) damage. Draw 2 more cards next turn.

Name: Reflex
Description: Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, draw 2(3) cards.

Name: Riddle With Holes
Description: Deal 3(4) damage 5 times.

Name: Setup
Description: Place a card in your hand on top of your draw pile. It costs 0 until it is played.

Name: Skewer
Description: Deal 7(10) damage X times.

Name: Tactician
Description: Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, gain 1(2) Energy.

Name: Terror
Description: Apply 99 Vulnerable. Exhaust.

Name: Well-Laid Plans
Description: At the end of your turn, Retain up to 1(2) card(s).

Name: A Thousand Cuts
Description: Whenever you play a card, deal 1(2) damage to ALL enemies.

Name: Adrenaline
Description: Gain 1(2) Energy. Draw 2 cards. Exhaust.

Name: After Image
Description: (Innate.) Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Block.

Name: Alchemize
Description: Obtain a random potion. Exhaust.

Name: Bullet Time
Description: You cannot draw additional cards this turn. Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn.

Name: Burst
Description: This turn, your next 1(2) Skill(s) is(are) played twice.

Name: Corpse Explosion
Description: Apply 6(9) Poison. When the enemy dies, deal damage equal to its max HP to ALL enemies.

Name: Die Die Die
Description: Deal 13(17) damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

Name: Doppelganger
Description: Next turn, draw X(+1) cards and gain X(+1) Energy.

Name: Envenom
Description: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison.

Name: Glass Knife
Description: Deal 8(12) damage twice. Decrease the damage of this card by 2 this combat.

Name: Grand Finale
Description: Can only be played if there are no cards in your draw pile. Deal 50(60) damage to ALL enemies.

Name: Malaise
Description: Enemy loses X(+1) Strength. Apply X(+1) Weak. Exhaust.

Name: Nightmare
Description: Choose a card. Next turn, add 3 copies of that card into your hand. Exhaust.

Name: Phantasmal Killer
Description: On your next turn, your Attacks deal double damage.

Name: Storm of Steel
Description: Discard your hand. Add 1 Shiv(+) into your hand for each card discarded.

Name: Tools of the Trade
Description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.

Name: Unload
Description: Deal 14(18) damage. Discard all non-Attack cards in your hand.

Name: Wraith Form
Description: Gain 2(3) Intangible. At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.
